<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pathfinder's Coin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=523)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

**Access** A character who is a member of the Pathfinder Society has access to this option.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This coin usually resembles ancient currency. An intricate matrix of gold and platinum wires inside the coin causes it to float an inch in the air and spin if placed on a [_wayfinder_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=470).

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command;    **Requirements** The coin is levitating above a _wayfinder_; **Effect** You give the coin a message of 25 words or fewer. The message repeats in your voice the next time the coin is floated above a _wayfinder_. A _Pathfinder’s coin_ can hold only one message at a time, and it replays its message only once.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
